content:
Congratulations to @Herb for opening the 5000th issue (just over 12 hours ago) in https://github.com/backdrop/backdrop-issues/issues

Does he get a prize or something?

I am so disappointed, I missed it by 1 with issue 5001. I'll have to start working on my campaign (maybe it would be a quest) to open issue # 10,000.

backdrop/backdrop-issues
Issue tracker for Backdrop core. Contribute to backdrop/backdrop-issues development by creating an account on GitHub.
That's a lot of bugs I need to find.
I think you'll have stiff competition with @klonos.
